Name: Core Passive: Brothers in Arms!
Additional Ability: Teamwork
Descriptions: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>12%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color> enemies triggers an additional bout of <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>14%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>23.3%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color> enemies triggers an additional bout of <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>16%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>26.6%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color> enemies triggers an additional bout of <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>18%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>30%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color> enemies triggers an additional bout of <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>33.3%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color> enemies triggers an additional bout of <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>22%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>36.6%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color> enemies triggers an additional bout of <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>24%</color>and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>40%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color> enemies triggers an additional bout of <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

Cons.Name: Warm-Up Exercises
Cons.Effect: When <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color> hits an enemy, Anton gains additional Energy, up to a maximum of 5 Energy per skill use.

Cons.Name: State of Flow
Cons.Effect: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> and enters <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, he gains a Shield that equals to 7.5% of his Max HP. While in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, entering combat or switching in reapplies the Shield effect. This effect can trigger once every 15s. The Shield dissipates when <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color> ends.

Cons.Name: Everyone Get Fired Up!
Cons.Effect: When Anton uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, all squad members' CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 12s.

Cons.Name: Break the Limit
Cons.Effect: When Anton's <color=#ffffff>Piledriver Attack</color> triggers a critical hit, his <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode)</color> and <color=#ffffff>Dodge Counter: Overload Drill (Burst Mode)</color> deal 4% more DMG for 30s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
